full_summary:
_____________
**Cancelled Tender Notice**

* **Reference Number**: PW-_KIN-615-8728
* **Solicitation Number**: EQ754-212131/B
* **Publication Date**: February 02, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 17, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
*
### Brief Description
#### 

This tender notice is cancelled. Please do not submit any tender proposals as only existing proposals will be considered.

**Key Details**: 
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
 
### Delivery and Contact Information:
* **Delivery Region**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **End User Entities**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Information**
*   Name: Andrew Denbeigh
*   Email: [andrew.denbeigh@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.denbeigh@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (613) 484-1586
*   Fax: (613) 545-8067
*   Contact Information Address: Kingston Procurement, 86 Clarence Street, Kingston, ON, K7L 1X3
